item.title: MIUI OS1.0.15.0.UNKCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K70 China

[Highlights]
Optimization: Touch controls in some scenarios
[Floating windows]
Optimization: Display and performance improvements for floating windows

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.3.0.UNKMIXM Fastboot update for POCO F6 Pro Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO F6 Pro Global

Codename: vermeer

Version: OS1.0.3.0.UNKMIXM | 14.0

Size: 9.3 GB

MD5: cd91ac8aac13bce5718de278fd8186c0

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to April 2024. Increased system security.
[Cross-device intelligent connectivity]
New: Manage your nearby smart devices in Xiaomi Smart Hub which constantly updates in real-time based on device networking
New: Now you can use the hardware capabilities (e.g. screen or connectivity) of one device across compatible interconnected devices
New: Files, clipboard content, and other items can be moved effortlessly between devices
[Security]
Optimization: Introducing Wild Boost

Download: Here
